problem.markdown:
1. If energy is lost in any way during vibration, the system can be considered to be ?
( ) Undamped ( ) Underdamped (x) Damped ( ) Overdamped
2. A body is said to undergo free vibration, when?
(x) It vibrates freely with no force acting on it ( ) It vibrates in free space ( ) The force causing the initial displacement is removed ( ) It vibrates freely with no resistive force acting on it
3. For a cantilever beam with a point load at the free end, The stiffness is
( ) 192EI/L3 ( ) EI/L3 (x) 3EI/L3 ( ) 48EI/L3
4. In free vibration experiment the damping may occur due to
( ) Hysteresis damping (x) Friction at support and Hysteresis damping ( ) Friction at support ( ) None of the above
5. The moment of inertia of a beam of circular cross-section is given as
(x) I=pi/64d4 ( ) I=pi/62d4 ( ) I=pi/32d4 ( ) I=pi/34d4
problem.p: 1. If energy is lost in any way during vibration, the system can be considered to be ?
2. A body is said to undergo free vibration, when?

choicegroup.choice: It vibrates freely with no force acting on it
The force causing the initial displacement is removed
It vibrates freely with no resistive force acting on it

4. In free vibration experiment the damping may occur due to

choicegroup.choice: Friction at support and Hysteresis damping
